project_descr: POVERTY COUNTRY PROGRMME ACTION PLAN (CPAP) - GRENADA DISASTER MANAGEMENT

outputs.output_descr:
The Grenada Country Programme Action Plan 2005-2011 for the countries of the sub-region identified the following key outputs under the Thematic area of Poverty Reduction.
1. MDGs integrated into the PRSP and other planning and reporting frameworks
2. Establishment and operationalisation of a comprehensive poverty and MDG monitoring system, with enhanced human capacity in the public sector and academia in data collection, analysis, monitoring and evaluation of social phenomena
3. New market opportunities identified to reduce poverty and income loss focusing on vulnerable groups
